A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Looks great and sounds great\, but that is where it stops being great for me.  
  What happened to Luke???  Did anyone one involved with this movie see the OT???  They took existing character arcs and thrown them in the sewer.  He deserved better than this.
  Why is Rey able to do the things she does with little or no training???
Why didn't the First Order just jump a couple Star Destroyers ahead of the rebel fleet???  Was there fuel supply low also???  
  I can suspend a certain amount of belief when I go to a fantasy movie\, but when it has such large plot/story problems I cant help but feel pulled out of the world.
  Really lost all excitement for the upcoming films.
